article: china has inaugurated a voluntary organ donor program , hoping to overhaul a system that now harvests the vast majority of its organs from black-market sellers and executed prisoners and leaves millions of ailing people without hope of getting a transplant .
abstract: china announces a system for voluntary organ donors
